definition[0]_en: A polarity in which colours and tones used for images are a mixture of those seen with the human eye and those opposite what the human eye would see.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A polarity in which colours and tones used for images are a mixture of those seen with the human eye and those opposite what the human eye would see.

definition[0]_en: A polarity in which colours and tones used for images are opposite those seen with the human eye.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A polarity in which colours and tones used for images are opposite those seen with the human eye.

definition[0]_en: A polarity in which colours and tones used for images are the same as those seen with the human eye.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A polarity in which colours and tones used for images are the same as those seen with the human eye.
